Module com.example.demo
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller

Class AnnouncementController

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.application.controller.AnnouncementController
public class AnnouncementController extends Object
A controller class for managing sale announcements.

    • createProperty

      public Property createProperty(Double propertyPrice, Double propertyArea, Address propertyAddress, Double propertyDistanceToCentre, List<Photograph> propertyPhotographs, int propertyBedroomNumber, int propertyBathroomNumber, int propertyParkingSpaceNumber, List<String> propertyEquipmentList, PropertyType propertyType, Store store, Client client, DateTime date)
      Creates a new property with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      propertyPrice - the price of the property
      propertyArea - the area of the property
      propertyAddress - the address of the property
      propertyDistanceToCentre - the distance of the property to the city centre
      propertyPhotographs - a list of URLs of photographs of the property
      propertyBedroomNumber - the property bedroom number
      propertyBathroomNumber - the property bathroom number
      propertyParkingSpaceNumber - the property parking space number
      propertyEquipmentList - the property equipment list
      propertyType - the type of the property
      store - the store where the property is listed
      client - the Client who created the property
      date - the date
      Returns:
      the created property

    • createProperty

      public Property createProperty(Double propertyPrice, Double propertyArea, Address propertyAddress, Double propertyDistanceToCentre, List<Photograph> propertyPhotographs, Integer propertyBedroomNumber, Integer propertyBathroomNumber, Integer propertyParkingSpaceNumber, List<String> propertyEquipmentList, Boolean propertyHasBasement, Boolean propertyHasLoft, String propertySunExposure, PropertyType propertyType, Store store, Client client, DateTime date)
      Creates a new Property with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      propertyPrice - The price of the property.
      propertyArea - The area of the property.
      propertyAddress - The address of the property.
      propertyDistanceToCentre - The distance from the property to the city center.
      propertyPhotographs - The list of URLs of photographs of the property.
      propertyBedroomNumber - The number of bedrooms in the property.
      propertyBathroomNumber - The number of bathrooms in the property.
      propertyParkingSpaceNumber - The number of parking spaces in the property.
      propertyEquipmentList - The list of equipment available in the property.
      propertyHasBasement - Whether or not the property has a basement.
      propertyHasLoft - Whether or not the property has a loft.
      propertySunExposure - The sun exposure of the property.
      propertyType - The type of the property.
      store - The store to which the property is associated.
      client - The Client who created the Property.
      date - the date
      Returns:
      The newly created Property.

    • createProperty

      public Property createProperty(Double propertyPrice, Double propertyArea, Address propertyAddress, Double propertyDistanceToCentre, List<Photograph> propertyPhotographs, Integer propertyBedroomNumber, Integer propertyBathroomNumber, Integer propertyParkingSpaceNumber, List<String> propertyEquipmentList, PropertyType propertyType, Store store, Client client)
      Creates a new property with the given parameters and returns it.
      Parameters:
      propertyPrice - The price of the property.
      propertyArea - The area of the property in square meters.
      propertyAddress - The address of the property.
      propertyDistanceToCentre - The distance to the city center in kilometers.
      propertyPhotographs - A list of URLs of photographs of the property.
      propertyBedroomNumber - The number of bedrooms in the property.
      propertyBathroomNumber - The number of bathrooms in the property.
      propertyParkingSpaceNumber - The number of parking spaces available with the property.
      propertyEquipmentList - A list of equipment and amenities available with the property.
      propertyType - The type of the property (e.g. apartment, house, office).
      store - The store where the property is listed for sale.
      client - The Client who created the property listing.
      Returns:
      The created Property object.

    • createSaleAnnouncement

      public Optional<SaleAnnouncement> createSaleAnnouncement(DateTime date, double commission, BusinessType businessType, Property property, double listedPrice, Agent agent)
      Creates a new sale announcement with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      date - the formatted date of the announcement
      commission - the commission for the announcement
      businessType - the business type of the announcement
      property - the property associated with the announcement
      listedPrice - the listed price of the property
      agent - the employee responsible for the announcement
      Returns:
      an optional containing the created sale announcement if successful, or an empty optional otherwise

    • createRentAnnouncement

      public Optional<RentAnnouncement> createRentAnnouncement(DateTime date, double commission, BusinessType businessType, Property property, Integer rentDuration, Agent agent)
      Creates a new rent announcement with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      date - the formatted date of the announcement
      commission - the commission for the announcement
      businessType - the business type of the announcement
      property - the property associated with the announcement
      rentDuration - the duration of the rent
      agent - the employee responsible for the announcement
      Returns:
      an optional containing the created rent announcement if successful, or an empty optional otherwise

    • getPropertyTypeByDescription

      public PropertyType getPropertyTypeByDescription(String propertyTypeDescription)
      Returns the PropertyType object that matches the given description.
      Parameters:
      propertyTypeDescription - a String representing the description of the desired PropertyType
      Returns:
      a PropertyType object that matches the given description, or null if no matching PropertyType is found

    • getBusinessTypeByDescription

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the BusinessType object with the given description, or null if not found
